conversations.content: You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What should I know about data protection when using this website?

By clicking "Accept all," you consent to data processing by DAAD and third parties that may not meet EU data protection standards. You can manage cookie preferences under the "Cookies" section at the bottom of the page.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Where can I learn about Germany’s higher education system?
The website provides information about Germany’s higher education institutions, qualification types, and career opportunities after graduation.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Is there support for international students at German universities?
Yes, all German universities have international offices ("Akademische Auslandsämter") that advise and support international students, organize events, and help connect you with peers.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Hey, how do I find a list of German universities?

You can search for higher education institutions in Germany via this link: [Hochschulkompass database](https://www.hochschulkompass.de/hochschulen/hochschulsuche/search/1.html?tx_szhrksearch_pi1%5Bsltyp%5D%5B1%5D=1&tx_szhrksearch_pi1%5Bresults_at_a_time%5D=25).

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Can I change my cookie preferences later?
Yes, you can adjust your consent for cookies at any time under the "Cookies" section at the end of the page, with future effect.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What’s the first place I should contact as an international student?
Reach out to your university’s international office ("Akademisches Auslandsamt")—they’re the primary support for orientation and networking.

Does this site explain career options after studying in Germany?
Yes, it includes details about subject groups offered and career opportunities post-graduation.

What does the DAAD do with my data?
The DAAD and third parties process usage data when you click "Accept all," but protections may differ from EU standards. Manage preferences under "Cookies."

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Are there events for international students?
Yes, university international offices often organize events and facilitate connections among international students.

Here’s the [Hochschulkompass database](https://www.hochschulkompass.de/hochschulen/hochschulsuche/search/1.html?tx_szhrksearch_pi1%5Bsltyp%5D%5B1%5D=1&tx_szhrksearch_pi1%5Bresults_at_a_time%5D=25) to explore German institutions.
